game

Class StunPowder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
        • game.StunPowder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Skilled, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon, Throwable

    public class StunPowder
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
implements Throwable
    Class for the stun powder which is an weaponItem that can be thrown by an actor and has 50% of chance to hit the target. The target is stunned (skip 2 turns) if the stun powder hits them, and has no effect if the target is already stunned.
